boolean isAssignableFrom(Class<?> c) Can c be assigned to this class? For example, String can be assigned to Object (by an upcast), however, an Object cannot be assigned to a String as a potentially exception throwing downcast would be necessary.
boolean isEnum() Tests whether the class represented by this Class is an enum.
